name: Last Survivor (Lanz Studio)
description: (Game are not finish)There is a spreading disease so the scientists made a medicine (injection) unexpectedly the medicine they made can be eaten by humans so until now they are making a cure to end it. There is a medicine made here but it does not work and worse as the zombies become aggressive Features Crafting:Craft Armors,Weapons,Parts and many more Fight:Fight against infected (zombies) to surviveFood & drinks:Foods are very important in time of apocalypse.Kill animals or cook foods to survive Pets:Send your pet somewhere else to find materials Gather:Use your Axe, Pickaxe to gather materials like Wood,Stones,Fibers and irons and more Open world explore:Each location provide resources but becareful of infected! The more rare items places the more dangerous
